messages.subject: Re:Chimps
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/2/2004 10:59:50 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Dontcha just love the new Chimpanzee song!?!? I swear, I am going to start sending some
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/2/2004 10:59:50 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
> We seem to get that from Barenaked Ladies CDs.
>
> Tuck


Dontcha just love the new Chimpanzee song!?!?

I swear, I am going to start sending some unsuspecting person
chimpanzee postcards.. LOL

Goia
*******
In the name of having a good time and amusing and horrifying our teenaged
son, my partner and I have begun singing the song everytime we come across any
chimp, monkey, gorilla, etc. Happens a lot. We also put a postcard with a chimp
in a Harvard tee shirt in Julian's stocking this Christmas.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
